title: The President of the Republic addresses a written message to the Emir of the State of Kuwait
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune sent, today, a written message to his brother, the Emir of the State of Kuwait, His Highness Sheikh Nawaf Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, as part of the permanent contact between the two leaders and to further deepen the fraternal relations between the two countries and peoples as well as the common will that animates them to pursue the efforts to defend the Arab nation causes.

The message was delivered by Ambassador Abdelhamid Abdaoui in his capacity as special envoy of the President of the Republic, who was received today in Kuwait, by the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Sheikh Salem Abdullah Al-Jaber Al-Sabah.
